body.name: BuTure Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 38Kpa 450W Stick Vacuum with Brushless Motor, Anti-Tangle Vacuum Cleaner for Home, Automatically Adjust Suction, Wireless Vacuum for Pet Hair/Carpet/Hard Floor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 3 mins
features: ✿ [450W Brushless Motor & 38KPa Powerful Suction] The cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with a 450W brushless motor with higher speed and torque, ensuring an unprecedented suction power up to 38Kpa, dedicated to picking up all surface debris and deeply embedded dirt, beats 90% of the vacuum cleaners on the market

✿ [Automatically Adjust Suction Power] Breaking the inflexible cleaning mode! The cordless stick vacuum has built-in smart sensors newly developed in 2024, which can intelligently detect floor types, and automatically adjust to a higher power on carpets, eliminating the trouble of manual adjustment

✿ [All-in-one Color Touch Screen] An LED touch screen at the top allows you to switch Eco, Standard, Boost, and Auto modes, plus keep an eye on battery life, dust cup fullness, and filter maintenance, 7-stage high-efficiency filtration which can effectively capture 99.9% of tiny dust particles, breathe easily while vacuuming

✿ [Whole House Cleaning] Rotatable electric brush head with floor lights and anti-winding roller to better capture hair and debris on hardwood floors and carpets. The detachable battery delivers up to 55 minutes at Eco suction, 10-15 minutes at max suction, with a 1.5L large canister, allowing you to vacuum the entire house in one go

✿ [Extra attachments and 3-year Warranty] Perfect vacuum cleaner for home comes with a crevice tool and a dusting brush. Worry-free after-sales: BuTure provides a 3-year free warranty and 7*24 after-sales service for valued customers, enjoying a high-quality buying experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cordless vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: Really pleased that I purchased the BuTure cordless vacuum. This vacuum replaced my Dyson V8 because it stopped working and I could not find a Dyson repair center close to my residence. The BuTure assembled very easy, it transitions and vacuums well on carpeted floors, tile and hardwood. It is quieter than the Dyson, lighter in weight and I like the headlamp to focus on the hard to see areas. The waste container empties effortlessly and the filters are easy to clean. The replaceable batteries keep me up and running between charges. I love the 3 year warranty, Thankfully I haven’t had to use it yet. I highly recommend this vacuum!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, powerful , compact
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Buture Model VC70 cordless vacuum is a remarkable device that has exceeded all my expectations. From its powerful suction to its smart touch screen, this vacuum proves to be a valuable addition to any household.One of the standout features of the Buture VC70 is its powerful suction. It effortlessly picks up dirt, dust, and debris, leaving my floors and carpets spotless. This is especially impressive considering its compact size and lightweight design.The smart touch screen adds a level of convenience and ease of use. It allows me to toggle between the 3 suction power modes effortlessly, ensuring optimal performance for different cleaning tasks. Additionally, the touch screen displays the battery life, so I never have to worry about it dying unexpectedly.Speaking of the battery, the Buture VC70 comes with a removable battery that can be charged separately, since it’s removable, if you want to save space or just for convenience. The wall mount is also a great addition, as it keeps the vacuum and its accessories organized and easily accessible.The lightweight and maneuverable head make cleaning a breeze. I can easily reach under furniture and into tight corners without straining my back. The vacuum glides smoothly across different surfaces, making the cleaning process quick and efficient.Additional filter is included in the box, and emptying out your dirt container is a 1 second/push of the button job.In conclusion, the Buture Model VC70 cordless vacuum is a top-notch cleaning device. Its powerful suction, smart touch screen, removable battery, wall mount, 3 suction power modes, lightweight design, and maneuverable head make it a must-have for any homeowner. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and efficient vacuum cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BuTure Cordless Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I have to be honest, I was not expecting anything great but after reading reviews I thought I would give it a try. I have a Golden Retriever who sheds ALOT! The vacuum packed up the hair, dust and dirt with no problem. The vacuum is lightweight, easy to assemble and easy to clean. The stick style goes under the furniture easily. This was a great purchase that checked all the boxes. I would recommend this vacuum as it does a great job for a home with pets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerhouse at a great price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’m loving this Buture VC70! The suction power is great and picks up small and large items easily from bare floors and rugs. It maneuvers easily around items and has enough suction to pick up debris at the edges. The light is a game changer for making sure I’ve picked up all of the crumbs from under my table and edges of my cabinetry. The display is easy to see battery power and adjust the suction. I also love that the battery is removable so I can have an extra on hand to tackle bigger/larger projects. The life of one battery is perfect for vacuuming 3 large rooms, light work or 2 at full suction power. I have an older model Buture where the debris canister sits perpendicular to the vacuum shaft, but this one (vc70) sits in line with the shaft and is much easier to maneuver and handle (see video). I’m also amazed that it ships in such a small box; easier to fit box in my trash and less waste!The only downside to this model is that the wall dock does not have integrated/auto charging once you replace it on the dock. This model you have to plug the charger back into the vacuum after redocking in order to recharge.Overall this is an awesome powerhouse vacuum, especially for the price! I will be recommending this brand and product to my friends and family and will buy from this brand in the future myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful Suction and Great Value
reviews.reviewText: This vaccume is a great value. It's powerful, maneuverable, light weight and easy to use. It also has enough power on one charge to vaccume a 2500 sq. foot house.
The media could not be loaded. Perfect vacuum for every household, great look and colour, powerfull suction and easy to manoeuver, light and easy to empty. Great product !

Nachdem uns bereits der iButure VC50 als Nachfolger eines Dyson V10 Absolute restlos überzeugt hat, haben wir uns nun den VC70 für unsere Gästewohnung zugelegt.Die Preis-Leistung der iButure Staubsauger ist einfach unschlagbar. Die Verarbeitungsqualität ist anstandslos, da gibt es nichts zu meckern. Des Weiteren lässt sich der VC70 sehr gut reinigen und auch ausleeren. Die Saugleistung ist sehr gut, das Licht möchten wir nicht mehr missen. Man sieht dem Staub und Dreck deutlich besser. Ebenso fällt die Geräuschentwicklung positiv auf, er klingt einfach angenehm und tut nicht in den Ohren weh wie es der Dyson tat. Die Akkuleistung ist topp, ebenso der Automatikmodus und die Bedienung über das Touch-Display. Hier gibt es nichts zu meckern und daher können wir sowohl dieses Modell als auch den etwas kleineren VC50 nur wärmstens empfehlen.

Ich habe es meine Frau gekauft. Sie saugt täglich und jammert immer sie einen neuen haben sollte. Dafür habe ich diesen gekauft. Er ist leistungssärker als der Vorgänger und tut es alles was er tun muss. Meine Frau ist damit zufrieden und ich kriege wieder meine Ruhe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The cordless vacuum cleaner I purchased has been a game-changer in my cleaning routine. Its lightweight design and freedom from cords make it incredibly convenient. The battery life is impressive, allowing me to clean multiple rooms without recharging. The suction power is strong, effortlessly picking up dirt and debris from various surfaces. Its versatile attachments tackle every nook and cranny, from carpets to hardwood floors. Emptying the dustbin is a breeze, and the filter system keeps the air clean. While it may be a bit pricier than corded models, the convenience and performance make it a worthwhile investment for hassle-free, efficient cleaning.

reviews.reviewTitle: Potencia de succión, diseño y precio
reviews.reviewText: Le compré a mi madre la versión anterior de esta aspiradora, y me convenció para que comprara una para mí, compré este modelo, v70 y estoy encantado tiene buena potencia de succión, absorve migas de pan, pelusas, etc tiene un modo automático que detecta el cambio de suelo a alfombra, tiene los ruedines de desplazamiento de goma por lo que no hace ruido al deslizarla la luz led te hace ver suciedad que sin ella no verías, súper contento volvería a comprarla sin duda
